column1: Smoque BBQ////My favorite was probably their pulled pork
column2: however comparing Smoque BBQ to Green St Smoked Meats
column3: I would rather go to Green St Smoked Meats. The sliced brisket was good
column4: but seem to be dry. Their chicken was well cooked
column5: and the gumbo was delicious! If you want some kind of dessert get the peach cobbler
